title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1989/91 of 5 July 1991 on imports of preserved cultivated mushrooms from third countries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1989/91  of 5 July 1991  on imports of preserved cultivated mushrooms from third countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Until 31 December 1991, the allocation of the overall quantity laid down in Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 1796/81 and set out in Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1707/90 shall be adjusted in accordance with the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 July 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 198, 4. 7. 1981, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 158, 23. 6. 1990, p. 34. (3) OJ No L 358, 21. 12. 1990, p. 51.
ANNEX
(tonnes)
Supplier country  Quantity     The People's Republic of China  28 230  The Republic of Korea  400  The Republic of China (Taiwan)  1 900  Hong Kong  150  Others  1 795     Reserve  2 275
